snippet: While the wealthy of the past traveled for leisure and climate, today’s tycoons have a social calendar of conferences, exclusive parties and art auctions.
abstract: Robert Frank Inside Wealth column observes that many among the contemporary superrich describe grueling social calendar that is closely tied to their business interests; notes that hectic schedule marks departure from wealthy in the past, who largely traveled for leisure and climate; describes perennial events on calendar.
lead_paragraph: While the wealthy of the past traveled for leisure and climate, today’s tycoons have a social calendar of conferences, exclusive parties and art auctions.

headline.print_headline: For the New Superrich, Life Is Much More Than a Beach
headline.main: For the New Superrich, Life Is Much More Than a Beach
